___destination.description: Address of the account that can cash the check.

___expiration.description: Time after which the check is no longer valid.

___invoiceID.description: 256-bit hash, as a 64-character hexadecimal string, representing a specific reason or identifier for this check.

___sendMax.description: Amount of source currency the check is allowed to debit the sender, including transfer fees on non-XRP currencies.

___destinationTag.description: Destination tag that identifies the reason for the check, or a hosted recipient to pay.
